Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 123rd overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Eduardo Marpons (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2015, off Erik Boyce (SEA)...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2015...
Injured on 8/12/2016 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2016...
Traded from New York to Atlanta on 5/1/2017 (Going to ATL: 3B Motokurou Tadayuki, P William Kinch, P Ronald Lebowitz. Going to NY: CF Issac Scott)...
Injured on 9/29/2017 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2018, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/3/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $2,130,000 per year...
